trends: There have been 12 other sightings in North Bay
There were no other sightings in North Bay on or around September 29th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsFireball with orange & red tail close to object , streaming blue & green, passed over house across street in a direction from NNE travelling SSE below cloud. I thought it was a meteorite but very big and low. We drove down toward the direction it appeared to be going, but no sound of impact or bright glow on impact. Basically disappeared. What prompted me to wright in is, Ohio appears to had similar witnesses at the same time & date.
